body:
Hello! It's me again the annoying chocolate bar from that ugly sofa.

So what was your first consol or game?

Mine was my GBA Sp (Gameboy Advance Special I think that's sp :p)

My first game for it was: "Super Mario Advance 2" i later a about 3 years later when I was 7, got into the pokemon series. So for my birthday my parents got me the Origional: Sapphire, Ruby and Emerald.

this is just a little post from me :)

That game brings back a lot of good memories. :')

replies.body:
I broke one of my controllers about 2 or 3 years ago and I was able to find a replacement in a store.

The actual Gamecube itself stopped working as well, but the Wii I have is able to play Nintendo Gamecube disks. :P

My first console/handheld was the Nintendo DS.
